alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, EASTERN WAYNE AND UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, PREBLE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHERN BUTLER COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO, SOUTHERN DARKE, WESTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fountain City to 8 miles south of Brookville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Middletown, Richmond, Trotwood, Oxford, Englewood, Monroe, Trenton, Eaton, West Milton, Centerville, South Middletown, Liberty, Arcanum, Camden, Lewisburg, New Paris, West Alexandria, New Madison and Gratis. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 145 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern and east central Indiana...and southwestern and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
